title: New Generation
text: Ms. Wariya Pokaworanont and Ms. Narakorn Duankhai are emerging members who play a crucial role in the enhancement and development of the community enterprise, Mo Boonrueng Thai Traditional Medicine. They have been actively involved in various aspects, particularly in improving sales. By leveraging their expertise in marketing and design, they have modernized and made the community enterprise's products more appealing to customers. They have revamped the packaging to be aesthetically pleasing, user-friendly, and to effectively preserve the quality of the herbs. Additionally, they have contributed to the continuation of traditional herbal inhaler production by integrating traditional knowledge with modern technology.
